leukapp.apps.individuals.models module¶

ORM models for the individuals application.

See Django’s Model Documentation for more information.

class Individual(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: leukapp.apps.core.models.LeukappModel

requirements: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17TJ6zQ3OzwE-AZVZykFzzbHxtDM88aM7vvCPxJQ8-_M/edit#gid=288765627

institution = None¶

Indicates whether the Indiviual comes from MSK or not. See the available choices: INSTITUTION.

species = None¶

Indicates the Indiviual species. See the available choices: SPECIES.

ext_id = None¶

Indicates the Indiviual external id. This field is validated using the ext_id_validator.

Warning

MRNs are not allowed for HUMANS from MSK. Please use a pseudo MRN or other type of identifier.

tumors_count = None¶
normals_count = None¶
int_id = None¶
slug = None¶
check_institution()[source]¶

Determines whether or not the Individual comes from MSK or not.
